svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2022-03-21T01:17:04.845Z" agent="5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/99.0.4844.74 Safari/537.36" version="16.6.3" etag="LofKVQRjXO3SCwm4c7u-" type="google"><diagram id="_g-NH64K23JQKuSmWeya"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 838px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 2px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

table.style: table-layout: fixed ; font-size: 10pt ; font-family: "arial" ; width: 0px ; border-collapse: collapse ; border: none

td.style: overflow: hidden ; padding: 2px 3px ; vertical-align: middle ; background-color: rgb(28 , 69 , 135) ; font-size: 8pt ; font-weight: bold ; overflow-wrap: break-word ; color: rgb(255 , 255 , 255) ; text-align: center
